summary: Tired of the umonotonous life fighting beast for food and longing for new adventures and companions., bandit archer Chaos left the bandit redoubt and traveled alone in skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/25245-1-1349768058.jpg[/img]
[size=6]Description[/size]
[size=4]Tired of the umonotonous life fighting beast for food and longing for new adventures and companions., bandit archer Chaos left the bandit redoubt and traveled alone in skyrim.[/size]
[size=4]Chaos is a male, Nordic follower who can be recruited in the Giant Sleeping Inn to join your travels. He fights with a bow.[/size]
[size=4]
[/size][size=6]Installation[/size]
[size=4]Use NMM to install this mod.[/size]
[size=4]
[/size][size=6]Bugs[/size]
[size=4]After loading the game, if Cha[font=Tahoma]os\' face looks odd, open console, select him and enter \"setnpcweight 40\". Then save the game and reload.[/font]

[/size][size=6]Credits[/size]
[size=4]This mod was created by kenglidexiaozei and posted on 3DM. [/size]
[size=4]The base of the skin texture was created by Chris57.[/size]
[size=4]Tinybeast translated and uploaded it.

[/size][size=6]Enjoy![/size]

????????????[url=http://bbs.3dmgame.com/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=3396447][size=4]http://bbs.3dmgame.com/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=3396447[/size][/url][size=4]
[/size]
author: kenglidexiaozei
